Title: Relates to mandating transparency of the expenses of title insurance corporations and authorizing the department of financial services to lower title insurance rates
Summary: Mandates transparency of the expenses of title insurance corporations, including marketing expenses, lobbying expenses, salaries and other forms of compensation and authorizes the department of financial services to lower title insurance rates if deemed excessive.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to mandating transparency of the expenses of title insurance corporations and authorizing the department of financial services to lower title insurance rates
